statements: UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_url = 'www.example.com/home' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET referral_source = 'Google' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET referral_source='Search Engine' WHERE user_id=123 AND page_url='/home'
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visit_timestamp='2022-07-15 10:30:00' WHERE page_url='/about' AND user_id=456
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET total_visits = 10000, unique_visitors = 5000 WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE marketing_strategies SET effectiveness_score = 8.5, target_audience = 'Young Adults' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET unique_visitors = 1500, total_visits = 3000 WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND page_url = '/home';
UPDATE marketing_strategies SET effectiveness_score = 8.5, target_audience = 'Gen Z' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET budget = 15000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 5;

UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET budget = 15000.50, targeting_criteria = 'Age < 35' WHERE campaign_id = 3;

UPDATE website_visits SET page_url = '/new-page' WHERE visit_id = 123;

UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET start_date='2022-09-01', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id=2;
